new: macOS Support: Now available for macOS.
* Open empty terminal, launch with default command, open in-app/default browser, or disable browser opening
* Profile with Patreon login, update management, and sponsor credits
improve: Enhanced UI: Refreshed backgrounds, removed hover shadows in settings and launch config layouts
Added transition effects to settings page selects
Updated settings page UI with improved switch
Upgraded settings buttons to Mantine components

new: Linux Support: Now available for Linux.
Extension List for Web UIs: View and install all available extensions for WebUI interfaces.
Auto-Update Option for Extensions: Enable automatic updates for web UI extensions before launching.
Open in Default Browser: Open WebUI in your default browser by holding CTRL and clicking the address bar.
improve: Close the launch configuration modal by pressing the Escape key.
Card titles now use title case for better readability.
Applied title case to installed extension names for consistency.
Reduced text size for a cleaner view of installed extensions.
Display Installed status for already cloned extensions.
Auto-focus is now enabled for search in the 'Add Argument' modal and the 'Extensions' tab.
bug: Fixed issues with recognition and validation of Git URLs.
Fixed an issue where the update badge wasn't removed correctly after uninstallation.
The badge icon is now hidden after module updates.
Fixed issue where the fullscreen mode toggle was not working.
Fixed issue where Initializer window not working (White Screen).
Fixed issue where 'Save As', 'Save', or 'Export' workflow buttons in the ComfyUI did not trigger the expected save dialog.
new: Added a custom modal to replace the default `prompt` for all WebUI's.
